input_options.title: Input Options
input_options.description: Parameters for finding and handling input data for analysis.

ubam.description: An unaligned bam file or containing Pore-C concatemer sequences

ref.description: A fasta file containing the reference genome to map against

vcf.description: An optional phased VCF file that will be used to haplotag alignments

cutter.description: The enzyme used in the restriction digest

output_options.title: Output Options
output_options.description: Parameters for saving and naming workflow outputs.

out_dir.description: Directory for output of all user-facing files.

advanced_options.title: Advanced Options
advanced_options.description: Avanced options for configuring processes inside the workflow.

chunk_size.description: Split input bam into reads of this size

threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for more intense processes (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_map_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for aligning reads from uBAM (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_sort_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for sorting and indexing aligned reads from uBAM (limited by config executor cpus)

ubam_bam2fq_threads.description: Set max number of threads to use for uncompressing uBAM and generating FASTQ for alignment (limited by config executor cpus)

advanced_options.help_text: These advanced options do not need to be changed for typical use, but allow fine tuning of workflows for users who want more control over the workflow.

pore_c_tools_options.title: Pore-C Tools Options
pore_c_tools_options.description: Parameters to control the pore-c tools

minimap2_settings.description: The minimap2 settings for mapping monomers

chromunity_merge_distance.description: Merge colinear alignments separated by less than this distance into a single monomer

4dn_files_options.title: 4DN files Options
4dn_files_options.description: Create files for the 4D nucleome toolset

pairs.description: Create a 4DN-format pairs file (also calculate stats).

cool_bin_size.description: The resolution of the base cooler file

mcool_resolutions.description: The resolutions of the mcool file (see cooler documentation for details).

paired_end_bam_options.title: Paired-end BAM Options
paired_end_bam_options.description: Create mock paired-end BAM files for legacy tools

paired_end_minimum_distance.description: Remove trans pairs and cis- pairs separated by a distance shorter than this

paired_end_maximum_distance.description: Remove trans pairs and cis- pairs separated by a distance greater than this

disable_ping.description: Enable to prevent sending a workflow ping.

process_label.description: The main process label for template processes to use by default

docs.intro:
## Introduction

This section of documentation typically contains an overview of the workflow in terms of motivation
and bioinformatics methods, listing any key tools or algorithms employed, whilst also describing its
range of use-cases and what a suitable input dataset should look like.
